pages.name: Entry Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/rider_core_ids#keirou_rider_core_id)Kamen Rider Keilow Core ID$(/l)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Keilow
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_keirou)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Slow Falling

pages.name: Ninja Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#ninja_raise_buckle)Ninja Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Keirou
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_keirou)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Slow Falling$(br2)Ninja Buckle Effects:$(li)Speed III$(li)Haste II$(li)Jump Boost V

pages.name: Armed Propeller
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#propeller_raise_buckle)Propeller Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Keilow
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_keirou)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Slow Falling$(br2)Propeller Buckle Effects:$(li)Slow Falling VII$(li)Jump Boost VII
